Description of incident: MHS discovered a second breach during the process of investigating a dishonest employee's misuse of patient data in January of 2012.  Employees of affiliated physicians' offices may have improperly accessed patient information through a web portal used by physicians who provide care and treatment at MHS.  Patient names, Social security numbers, and dates of birth may have been accessed during the period between January 1, 2011 and July 5, 2012.
